group.attribute: In response to the market's needs Dotpay has been delivering innovative Internet payment services providing the widest e-commerce solution offer for years. The domain is money transfers between a buyer and a merchant within a complex service based on counselling and additional security. Within an offer of Internet payments Dotpay offers over 140 payment channels including: mobile payments, instalments, cash, e-wallets, transfers and credit card payments.
To all new clients who have filled in a form and wish to accept payments we offer promotional conditions:
commission on Internet payments (not less than PLN 0.30)
